title: Romance Guide
content: Shattered Sanctum without initiating combat (friendly terms with the Goblins), you can choose to speak to Minthara and agree to join her hunt (Attack Druid Grove). Back at the Druids Grove gain Minthara's trust by betraying the Tieflings (Betray Zavlor) during the ensuing confrontation. Opening the gate for Minthara's hunting party (Blow the warhorn - Betray Zavlor) will lead to a battle with the grove's inhabitants.
